name: Steven Universe Space Tumblr Instant Messager
description: This code is a background design for the tumblr instant messager based on an edited seamless Steven Universe background. It goes great with my Steven Universe Space Tumblr Dash. If you want or need something adjusted, customized, or have any other questions or concerns, feel free to contact me @eatyourheirs.
additional_info:
